message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the product, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. Would you consider offering it for $150?
I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get a bit more for it. How about $155?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget, would you be open to selling the product for $150?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $158, Bob. That's the lowest I can do. If you're still interested, let me know!
